text: Discovery Kids (stylized as DK) is a Latin American pay television channel. It is owned by Discovery Kids The channel is headquartered in Miami, Florida. It started as a programming block on the Latin American version of Discovery Channel. The channel is divided into six live feeds: Pan-regional, Colombia, Southern, Chile, Mexico and Brazil. Each feed has their own HD feeds. Until 2019, the channel had an HD version with a different schedule broadcasting to all Latin America. The network is also available in the Caribbean and Puerto Rico. ==Notes== Latin American Kids Category:1996 establishments in Mexico
title: Discovery Kids (Latin American TV channel)
